text: Hello! Thanks for joining today's system design interview. I'm excited to work through a problem with you. Before we start, I'd love to learn a bit about your background. What's your name?
My name is Sarah Johnson, I have 8 years of professional experience
Great to meet you, Sarah! Eight years of experience is excellent. What areas or domains have you primarily worked in?
My domain expertise is backend distributed systems. I scaled Netflix microservices to 100M users and built payment infrastructure at Stripe

Those sound like incredibly impressive projects, Sarah! Scaling Netflix microservices and building payment infrastructure at Stripe really highlights your expertise.

Here's how today's system design interview will work: We'll go through a problem together covering clarifications, requirements, data modeling, API design, architecture, and then potentially dive deep into specific areas. It's a collaborative discussion, so please feel free to ask questions, share your thoughts, and explore different approaches out loud. The whole thing usually takes about 45-60 minutes.

Are you ready to begin?
